title: History, Shopping & Culture in the Heart of Arty Düsseldorf
description: Take in the rich culture of the riverside German city of Düsseldorf, Germany’s art and fashion capital. Stay at the five-star Steigenberger Parkhotel Düsseldorf in the heart of the city and within walking distance of the city’s attractions including the Rhine river promenade and Altstadt Old Town. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, one indulgent three-course dinner and a daily drink each at the hotel’s bar.

title: Düsseldorf Designer Escape in the Japanese Quarter
description:
Treat yourself to an indulgent stay in one of Düsseldorf’s finest designer hotels, Max Brown Midtown. An idyllic urban sanctuary positioned in the heart of the Japanese Quarter, just a skip away from the Altstadt (Old Town), this is the perfect launchpad for exploring the city, with the very best of midtown on your doorstep - including lengthy shopping street, Königsallee, Carlsplatz Market Square and Park Hofgarten.

Indulge in continental favourites every morning in the breakfast room, enjoy a tipple at the mid-century modern bar or simply unwind in the hotel's individually designed guest rooms, featuring signature bedding, your own in-room record player and a full range of Zenology spa products. With the 'Dorf’s finest galleries, boutiques, eateries and attractions just beyond Max Brown Midtown’s doors, there’s no better place to discover the beauty of one of Germany’s most underrated cities.
